get_energyperphoton.pro


Routines

top source get_energyperphoton

result = get_energyperphoton(wave, wave_in_nm=wave_in_nm, verbose=verbose, debug=debug)

NAME: get_energyphoton

USAGE: Energy=get_energyphoton(wavelength [,WAVE_IN_NM=WAVE_IN_NM])

PURPOSE: Convert from wavelength to photon energy

INPUT PARAMETERS:

WAVE_IN_NM : Set to if the input wavelength is in NM (default=1) VERBOSE : Set if reporting of details is desired DEBUG : Set to report additional information useful in debugging.

OUTPUT PARAMETERS:

Photon energy in J

Parameters

wave

Keywords

wave_in_nm
verbose
debug
